items.content_html: Task-Manager-App offers a lightweight backend solution for task management, utilizing Express.js and MongoDB. Seamlessly create, retrieve, update, and delete tasks with its RESTful API. Ideal for solo users or collaborative teams, it simplifies task organization and tracking efficiently.
